name: Slingball (Torreng Labs)
description:
Balls touchin' from behind

You have three, bear in mind

Slingball is a competitive sport game that each team has 3 players. The goal is to eliminate all opponents from the field by hitting them from behind with the ball. The team who wins 4 rounds wins the game!

You, as purple team, will play against the AI, greens. If one of your players hold the ball, it can throw the ball to any direction you choose. Be careful, all players except ball holder can move as well. Avoid opponent's shots, move your passive players and discover formations and tactics to win the game!

PS: Suggested play on fullscreen mode (Press F to enter)

CONTROLS
  • Mouse Drag: any position to choose closest player
  • Mouse Drop: any position to slingshot ball or the player
  • M: Mute audience
  • F: Enter/Exit Fullscreen

  4. April: Don't Drown // A game about diving as deep as possible and coming back to tell the story
  5. May: Infight // A puzzle-shooter prototype about setting enemies against one another
  6. June: Sokotetris // A game about joining tetris pieces together
  7. July: Cacti // A game about long spiky green things that enjoy your inevitable dismay
  8. August: Solitaire: Tactics // A solitaire game that's less about luck and more about strategy
  9. September: TNT 99 // A game about how deliberate your mayhem can be
  10. October: Slingball // A game about slings, balls and backstabbing
